column2: Total No. Persons under Arrest including those from Previous Year (Col.2)
column3: No. of Persons whose Cases Compounded or Withdrawn (Col.3)
column4: No. of Persons whose Trial Completed (Col.4)
column5: No. of Persons whose Trial Remained Pending (Col.5)
column6: No. of Persons whose No. of Persons Convicted (Col.6)
column7: Percentage of Persons whose Trials Remained Pending {(Col.4 *100)/Col.2} = (Col.7)
column8: Percentage of Persons Convicted to Trials Completed {(Col.6 * 100) / Col.4} = (Col.8)
